channel.title: 718 players cant equip items
channel.description: Ok so, on my server there was this one player who was making it so when he wore black claws his character had a wall through him, and it was sort of glitching out. So I reset the server, only to find that I couldnt equip anything.. the inventory still worked because I could still eat food but I could not equip anything, along with a few players.. I have restarted the server multiple times, and now I can equip items, but some other players cannot. If you know whats causing this, please tell me. The only way they can equip armour at the moment is going into the equipment tab and then equipping it from there.

item.title: 718 players cant equip items
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

Ok so, on my server there was this one player who was making it so when he wore black claws his character had a wall through him, and it was sort of glitching out. So I reset the server, only to find that I couldnt equip anything… the inventory still worked because I could still eat food but I could not equip anything, along with a few players… I have restarted the server multiple times, and now I can equip items, but some other players cannot. If you know whats causing this, please tell me.
The only way they can equip armour at the moment is going into the equipment tab and then equipping it from there.
